fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.author: Giuseppi Guanciale
fields.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Cook the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese.
Combine the pasta and pancetta, then add the egg mixture off the heat.
Serve with freshly ground black pepper and grated Parmesan cheese.

fields.title: Chicken Alfredo
fields.author: Ezio Auditore
fields.description: A rich and creamy pasta dish with grilled chicken and Alfredo sauce.

fields.title: Perfect Keto Breakfast
fields.author: Josh Vaughan
fields.description: A hearty, filling, and satisfying ketogenic kickstart to your day!
ingredients: 1oz room temp grass fed Irish butter (Kerrygold), separated
Dill, salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste
steps: Heat a non-stick skillet on medium to medium-high heat and add bacon strips.
Once the bacon is cooked to desired doneness, remove from heat and place on a rack or paper-towel lined plate to drain.
If preferred, transfer bacon grease to storage vessel, clean pan and then return to heat.
Add Irish butter to the pan and allow to melt and coat the bottom.
While butter is melting, whisk three whole eggs together and add to pan. Immediately start pushing cooked egg to center.
Once the eggs reach a semi-cooked consistency, add seasonings and cover to steam and turn heat down to low.
Plate with sliced avocado and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Enjoy!
